name: Bounty Hunter III
description:
Before you read anything on this page, I strongly recommend you play Bounty Hunter II  - it's not a very long game and you'll be much less confused when playing this one.

Synopsis:

After a decisive battle against Milbert, Peast emerges victorious and takes back the money that was once his. Unforunately for Peast, his victory was short lived as Milbert returns to steal the money back. Their feud leads to Milbert inadvertently crashing into the yoche, making the ship go downwards to its descent.

Bounty Hunter III will reveal what happened to both of them as well as introducing a new main character who, professionally, is quite similar to Peast.

Instructions:

Left click - Melee attack 
Right click - Fire gun

Hitting enemies with your melee attacks allows you to gain ammo points, which you can then use your gun with.

Movement controls can be changed in the title screen.

Credits:

Programming, Design, Art, Animations, Sounds: Prownie

Art and animations: Joe
